snippet: Mexico defeated Costa Rica and Panama topped Trinidad and Tobago on penalty kicks on Sunday, setting up a meeting between the two in the Gold Cup semifinals.
abstract: Mexico defeats Costa Rica, 1-0, and Panama defeats Trinidad and Tobago, 6-5, on penalty kicks, to advance to semifinals of Concacaf Gold Cup soccer tournament.
lead_paragraph: Mexico defeated Costa Rica and Panama topped Trinidad and Tobago on penalty kicks on Sunday, setting up a meeting between the two in the Gold Cup semifinals.

headline.main: Mexico and Panama Move On at Gold Cup
